function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differing COVID-19 guidelines across countries","Impact":"Inconsistent measures may lead to confusion and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Harmonization of guidelines through international collaboration and knowledge sharing","Technologies":"Global communication platforms for cross-country coordination","People":"International agencies, national governments, healthcare stakeholders","Owner":"International agencies, national governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of specific ventilation guidelines for assembly line workers","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread among assembly line workers due to inadequate ventilation","Mitigation":"Development of sector-specific guidelines for different types of workers, with input from industry and health experts","Technologies":"Ventilation systems tailored to specific workplace requirements","People":"Business chambers, workers' bodies, government authorities","Owner":"Industry standards organizations, workplace safety committees"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of regulations in bringing about behavioral changes","Impact":"High likelihood of non-compliance and neglect of safety measures by workers","Mitigation":"Education and communication campaigns to promote understanding and adoption of safety protocols","Technologies":"Digital platforms for dissemination of educational materials and remote training","People":"Employers, workplace managers, occupational health professionals","Owner":"Employers, workplace managers, occupational health professionals"}]}
